message: Generated 18 quiz questions for Week 6 (Perception) covering all required topics with balanced difficulty distribution

topics_covered: Gestalt principles (figure-ground, proximity, closure, similarity, continuity, symmetry)
Depth perception (binocular cues: retinal disparity, convergence)
Depth perception (monocular pictorial cues: relative size, interposition, linear perspective, texture gradient, light/shadow, aerial perspective, relative height)
Perceptual constancy (size, shape, brightness, color, location)
Visual illusions (Ponzo, Muller-Lyer, Horizontal-Vertical, Poggendorf, Titchener's circles, Ames room)
Theories (Gregory's constructivist vs Gibson's ecological, affordances, Harris complementary view)
question_types: Application of principles to real scenarios
Classification of depth cues (monocular vs binocular, pictorial vs non-pictorial)
